Mike

void break_stop() noexcept#

Author

void cout(std::string text = "", bool format_print = false, bool newline = true) noexcept#

Author

Mike

Note

Pint time formatted or in ms

Parameters:

  • text – A text printed first without a newline

  • format_print – Print by using the function range (false : in ms)

  • newline – Print with a newline
